label: Medical Terms-GRK & LAT Roots
description: Introduction to the study of the Greek and Latin roots of contemporary medical terminology and to the linguistic patterns governing their combination and usage.
classScheduleInformation: This course is offered exclusively online with weekly assignments, but no required class time except for exams. This section has one or more proctored exams, which may carry additional fees. Proctoring options include fee-based ProctorU and approved proctoring centers.
